text: Busanjin Station () is a station of the Busan Metro Line 1 in Sujeong-dong, Dong District, Busan, South Korea. The station is unrelated to the Busanjin Station of Korail. ==References== ==External links== * Cyber station information from Busan Transportation Corporation Category:Railway stations in Busan Category:Busan Metro stations Category:Dong District, Busan Category:Railway stations opened in 1987
title: Busanjin station (Busan Metro)
